name: The cool cascade man (IDK)
description:
A story of a swordsman who can only reflect the water to attack enemies, One day his master wants some cola, so his master gives him a final mission is to find cola and bring it back to him.

Controls

A,D : walk right/left

Space bar : jump

J : reflect

The player can attack enemies by reflecting projectile only.

(The menu is kinda rush sorry about that!)

Special thanks to Emilio Coppola and Dialogic godot plugin team!
